Basma Ahmed Sayyed Hassan (amụrụ na Disemba 7, 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Nna Basma bụ onye nta akụkọ ebe nne ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ nwa nwa site n'aka nne ya nke nwụrụ anwụ Youssef Darwish, onye bụ onye Juu Ijipt na onye na-eme ihe ike.
Basma gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum Cairo

Basma malitere ọrụ ya na mahadum na ihe nkiri "El Madyna (The City) " ebe onye nduzi Yousry Nasrallah họọrọ ya isonye na ihe nkiri ahụ; Otú ọ dị, tupu ihe nkiri ahụ ọ gbalịrị ịbụ onye na-ekwu okwu n'ụlọọrụ redio ma gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ redio mba ahụ
Mana tupu ihe ọ bụla, Yousry Nasrallah họọrọ ya maka ihe nkiri "El Madyna (obodo). Ka oge na-aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro ihe nkiri American TV, Tyrant
Na 15 Febụwarị 2012, Basma Hassan lụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Amr Hamzawy, onye bụ onye omeiwu maka Freedom Egypt Party
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwanyị, Nadia, mana ha kewara na 2019.
